BackstoryDef.title: NCR settler's son
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in the New California Republic as the son of prosperous ranchers. [PAWN_pronoun] learned the values of hard work, community, and the importance of strong leadership from an early age.

BackstoryDef.title: NCR diplomat's son
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was raised in the NCR capital, watching [PAWN_possessive] parents navigate the complex world of post-war politics. [PAWN_pronoun] developed a keen understanding of negotiation and compromise.

BackstoryDef.title: NCR war hero president
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] rose to fame as a military leader in the Baja Campaign, earning the nickname "the Hero of the Mojave." [PAWN_pronoun] parlayed this military success into a political career, eventually becoming President of the NCR.

BackstoryDef.title: NCR ambassador
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] served as the NCR's ambassador to New Vegas, tasked with maintaining diplomatic relations and advancing the Republic's interests in the Mojave. [PAWN_pronoun] became skilled at navigating complex political situations.

BackstoryDef.title: NCR officer's son
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was raised in a military family, learning discipline and strategy from an early age. [PAWN_pronoun] always knew [PAWN_pronoun] would follow in [PAWN_possessive] father's footsteps.

BackstoryDef.title: Hub refugee
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in the Hub, one of the NCR's core territories. [PAWN_pronoun] witnessed both the prosperity and challenges of the growing Republic, inspiring [PAWN_objective] to serve.

BackstoryDef.title: NCR patriot's daughter
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was raised with unwavering belief in the NCR's mission to bring order to the wasteland. [PAWN_pronoun] learned that strength and determination were the keys to survival.

BackstoryDef.title: NCR general
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] rose through the NCR military ranks to become General, taking command of the Hoover Dam campaign. Known as "General Wait-and-See," [PAWN_pronoun] favored cautious, defensive strategies.

BackstoryDef.title: NCR colonel
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] served as commanding officer of Camp McCarran, managing thousands of troops in the Mojave. [PAWN_pronoun] earned respect for [PAWN_possessive] fairness and tactical competence.

BackstoryDef.title: NCR hardline colonel
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] became one of the NCR's most aggressive commanders, stationed at Hoover Dam. [PAWN_pronoun] believed in total victory and had no tolerance for weakness or compromise.

BackstoryDef.title: Freeside survivor
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in Freeside before the NCR's arrival, witnessing the harsh reality of wasteland life. This shaped [PAWN_possessive] determination to bring order and safety to dangerous places.

BackstoryDef.title: NCR city kid
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in one of the NCR's safe, prosperous cities. [PAWN_pronoun] enlisted to prove [PAWN_objective] could handle the dangers of the frontier.

BackstoryDef.title: NCR rancher's daughter
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was raised on a cattle ranch in NCR territory, learning discipline and hard work. [PAWN_pronoun] joined the military to see more of the world.

BackstoryDef.title: caravan guard's son
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] traveled the wasteland with [PAWN_possessive] parents' caravan, learning to watch for danger and handle weapons at a young age.

BackstoryDef.title: NCR major
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] became a respected NCR major, known for [PAWN_possessive] competence and concern for [PAWN_possessive] troops. [PAWN_pronoun] led the effort to combat the Fiends threatening Camp McCarran.

BackstoryDef.title: NCR logistics major
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] specialized in supply logistics, ensuring NCR forces in the Mojave stayed equipped and fed. [PAWN_possessive] organizational skills proved invaluable.

BackstoryDef.title: NCR field major
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] rose through the ranks to become a major, leading troops in combat operations across the Mojave. [PAWN_pronoun] earned respect for [PAWN_possessive] tactical skill.

BackstoryDef.title: NCR quartermaster major
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] became the quartermaster at Camp McCarran, responsible for managing the massive supply operations needed to support the NCR's Mojave campaign.

BackstoryDef.title: NCR farm boy
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up on a farm in NCR territory, learning to work hard and shoot straight. [PAWN_pronoun] enlisted as soon as [PAWN_pronoun] was old enough.

BackstoryDef.title: Shady Sands kid
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was raised in Shady Sands, the capital of the NCR. [PAWN_pronoun] grew up surrounded by the Republic's ideals of democracy and expansion.

BackstoryDef.title: NCR infantry captain
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] served as an infantry captain in the NCR army, leading troops in numerous engagements against raiders, tribals, and hostile factions.

BackstoryDef.title: NCR garrison captain
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] commanded garrison forces at key NCR installations in the Mojave, balancing security needs with limited resources.

BackstoryDef.title: wasteland hunter's son
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] learned to track and shoot from [PAWN_possessive] father, a skilled wasteland hunter. These skills made [PAWN_objective] a natural fit for 1st Recon.

BackstoryDef.title: NCR military brat
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up moving from base to base as [PAWN_possessive] parents served in the NCR military. [PAWN_pronoun] knew the military life intimately.

BackstoryDef.title: lawman's daughter
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was raised by a former sheriff who instilled in [PAWN_objective] a strong sense of justice and order. [PAWN_pronoun] joined the NCR Military Police.

BackstoryDef.title: 1st Recon lieutenant
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] commanded a squad in the elite 1st Recon unit, specializing in long-range reconnaissance and precision marksmanship.

BackstoryDef.title: NCR platoon lieutenant
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] led a platoon in the 1st Company, 5th Battalion, stationed at the vital Mojave Outpost. [PAWN_pronoun] kept morale up despite limited resources.

BackstoryDef.title: NCR military police officer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] served as a Military Police officer at Camp McCarran, investigating crimes and maintaining discipline among the troops.

BackstoryDef.title: tribal survivor
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] survived the massacre of [PAWN_possessive] tribe by the Great Khans. This tragedy drove [PAWN_objective] to seek revenge and join the NCR military.

BackstoryDef.title: 1st Recon sniper
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] became a skilled sniper in 1st Recon's Alpha Squad. [PAWN_possessive] hatred of the Great Khans fueled [PAWN_possessive] determination in battle.

BackstoryDef.title: frontier settler
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up on the edge of NCR territory, learning to handle threats from raiders and wildlife. [PAWN_pronoun] enlisted to help protect others.

BackstoryDef.title: Ranger hopeful
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up idolizing the NCR Rangers and dreaming of joining their ranks. [PAWN_pronoun] trained constantly to prove [PAWN_objective] worthy.

BackstoryDef.title: troubled youth
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] had a difficult childhood, getting into trouble frequently. The NCR military offered [PAWN_objective] a chance at redemption and purpose.

BackstoryDef.title: NCR cadet
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] attended an NCR military academy as a teenager, learning discipline and combat skills. [PAWN_pronoun] excelled at following orders.

BackstoryDef.title: 1st Recon spotter
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] served in 1st Recon's Alpha Squad as a spotter. After a traumatic encounter with Cook-Cook of the Fiends, [PAWN_pronoun] struggled but remained determined.

BackstoryDef.title: Ranger-in-training
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] earned the right to wear Ranger patrol armor and trained under experienced Rangers, working to prove [PAWN_objective] worthy of full Ranger status.

BackstoryDef.title: misfit soldier
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] served in the 9th Platoon, nicknamed "The Misfits" for their poor performance. Despite this reputation, [PAWN_pronoun] remained loyal to the NCR.

BackstoryDef.title: NCR military policeman
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] served in the NCR Military Police at Camp McCarran, maintaining order and investigating crimes among the troops.

BackstoryDef.title: sharpshooter's son
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] learned to shoot at a remarkably young age, showing natural talent with firearms. [PAWN_pronoun] earned [PAWN_possessive] nickname "10 of Spades" for [PAWN_possessive] accuracy.

BackstoryDef.title: slacker kid
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] had a relatively easy childhood in NCR territory, never taking things too seriously. The military was a rude awakening.

BackstoryDef.title: bookish child
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was more interested in books than combat training, but joined the military out of a sense of patriotic duty to the NCR.

BackstoryDef.title: anxious youth
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was an anxious child, often worried about what could go wrong. This made military service particularly challenging.

BackstoryDef.title: rule follower
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] always followed the rules and respected authority. The structured environment of the NCR military suited [PAWN_objective] perfectly.

BackstoryDef.title: enlisted family kid
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] came from a family of NCR enlisted soldiers. Military service was not just expected, it was tradition.

BackstoryDef.title: 1st Recon marksman
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] became one of the youngest members of 1st Recon, earning [PAWN_possessive] place through exceptional marksmanship despite [PAWN_possessive] young age.

BackstoryDef.title: misfit trooper
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] served in the infamous 9th Platoon "The Misfits," known for their lack of discipline and poor combat readiness.

BackstoryDef.title: misfit intellectual
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was placed in the 9th Platoon despite [PAWN_possessive] intelligence. [PAWN_pronoun] struggled with the physical demands of military service.

BackstoryDef.title: nervous trooper
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] served in the 9th Platoon, [PAWN_possessive] anxiety making it difficult to perform under pressure. [PAWN_pronoun] tried [PAWN_possessive] best despite constant worry.

BackstoryDef.title: NCR MP private
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] served in the Military Police at Camp McCarran, assisting with law enforcement duties and maintaining order among the troops.

BackstoryDef.title: NCR MP guard
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked as a Military Police guard at Camp McCarran, following in [PAWN_possessive] family's tradition of NCR service.

BackstoryDef.title: frontier orphan
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] lost [PAWN_possessive] parents to raiders at a young age. [PAWN_pronoun] was taken in by the NCR Rangers, who became [PAWN_possessive] new family.

BackstoryDef.title: legendary Ranger chief
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] became a legendary NCR Ranger, serving with distinction for decades. As Ranger Chief, [PAWN_pronoun] led the defense of Hoover Dam during the First Battle, but grew disillusioned with the endless war.

BackstoryDef.title: border town kid
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in a town on the edge of NCR territory, seeing Rangers as heroes who protected the frontier. [PAWN_pronoun] aspired to join their ranks.

BackstoryDef.title: scout's daughter
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] learned wilderness survival and stealth from [PAWN_possessive] parents, who worked as scouts for NCR caravans. [PAWN_pronoun] could move unseen even as a child.

BackstoryDef.title: Ranger's son
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was raised by a Ranger father, learning combat skills and ranger tactics from childhood. Following in those footsteps was never a question.

BackstoryDef.title: outpost kid
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up at remote NCR outposts, watching Rangers come and go. [PAWN_pronoun] learned that Rangers were the Republic's elite.

BackstoryDef.title: trader's daughter
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] traveled with [PAWN_possessive] merchant parents, learning to read people and handle dangerous situations. Rangers often provided escort for their caravans.

BackstoryDef.title: farm defender
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] helped defend [PAWN_possessive] family farm from raiders and wildlife, developing the skills that would later serve [PAWN_objective] as a Ranger.

BackstoryDef.title: military academy student
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] attended an NCR military academy, where [PAWN_pronoun] excelled in marksmanship and tactics. Rangers recruited the best graduates.

BackstoryDef.title: wasteland wanderer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up traveling the wasteland, learning self-reliance and survival. [PAWN_pronoun] saw the NCR Rangers as the ultimate wasteland survivors.

BackstoryDef.title: veteran's son
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was raised by an NCR veteran who taught [PAWN_objective] combat skills and respect for those who serve. Becoming a Ranger was the ultimate honor.

BackstoryDef.title: Ranger comm officer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] served as a Ranger communications officer, coordinating operations across the Mojave and ensuring Rangers stayed in contact with command.

BackstoryDef.title: stealth Ranger
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] became known among the Rangers for [PAWN_possessive] exceptional stealth abilities, earning the callsign "Ghost." [PAWN_pronoun] specialized in reconnaissance missions.

BackstoryDef.title: veteran Ranger officer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] followed [PAWN_possessive] father's path to become a Ranger communications officer, serving with distinction and coordinating critical operations.

BackstoryDef.title: Mojave Outpost Ranger
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was stationed at the vital Mojave Outpost, serving as one of the Rangers responsible for monitoring the Long 15 and protecting NCR supply lines.

BackstoryDef.title: Ranger intelligence officer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] specialized in intelligence gathering and analysis for the Rangers, using [PAWN_possessive] social skills to extract information and coordinate operations.

BackstoryDef.title: Ranger station commander
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] commanded a Ranger station in the Mojave, coordinating patrols and managing communications between remote outposts and NCR command.

BackstoryDef.title: tactical Ranger officer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] served as a Ranger communications officer with a focus on tactical operations, planning and coordinating strikes against the NCR's enemies.

BackstoryDef.title: veteran Ranger scout
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked as a Ranger scout and communications officer, coordinating long-range patrols and providing critical intelligence on enemy movements.

BackstoryDef.title: patrol Ranger
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] served as a patrol Ranger, wearing the distinctive patrol armor while scouting dangerous territories and engaging hostile forces in the Mojave.
